title: Haven't Migrated Off CentOS Yet? You Have Until June 30
author: Gregory M Kurtzer
description: As the clock ticks down, the imperative is clear: act now, secure your systems and ensure a smooth transition to a supported enterprise Linux operating system.
cntitle: 尚未迁移出 CentOS？您还有时间，截止日期为 6 月 30 日
cndescription: 时间紧迫，刻不容缓：立即行动，确保系统安全，并顺利迁移到受支持的企业级 Linux 操作系统。
